column4: Hello Guys, when i disconnect my Charger from my laptop, My keyboard stops working, is it a known issue?
only if your battery is unplugged, but then everything else would fail too
lol, yes
sorry, could not resist. depending on the version you are using at least not generally
why my keyboard stops working?
i have/had ubuntu running on various machines now and never had that issue
usb keyboard?
no.. Laptop keyboard
plus a lot of usb devices attached?
ah, ok
just for curiosity, what brand of laptop? did you review the HCL?
Dell E1405
Chefan: Ubuntu version Ubuntu 8.10
hmm, iirc dell even delivers with ubuntu, so basic stuff like that should work
what you could try is using a couple of live cd's to test if something got fubared in the latest release
how to debug this weird issue?
Okay
very difficult. 1st try would be to attach an external keyboard
hmm.. ok
and get a second box to connect to the laptop via ssh
it's a bit difficult to debug stuff without even a keyboard to use :D
OK.. then
i will install another linux flavor ;-)
